full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MI TRA BRGYA RTZA'I BLA RGYUD GSOL 'DEBS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DAD PA DANG GTONG BA'I RGYUD YONGS SU GTAMS SHING, DAM PA'I CHOS 'TSOL BA LA NAM YANG MI NGAL BA'I BI SHI REL THU CHOS RJE RDO RJE 'PHRENG BA DANG, MI TRA BRGYA RTZA GNYIS KYI DBANG DGOS ZHES NAN CHER BSKUL TSE KHAS BLANGS LTAR RDO RJE 'PHRENG BA CHU SPREL LOR BSKUR ZHING, CHU BYA LOR DE'I DPON PO THO YON ZLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG GIS KHO RANG GI BLA MA'I ZHAL MCHEM YIN ZHES NAN CHER BSKUL BA LTAR, MI TRA BRGYA RTZA'I DBANG BYAS SKABS MA NUNG ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG BSTAN PA RGYAL MTSAN DANG, HAL HA ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG DGE LEGS, @011B DAR HAN DGE SLONG BLO BZANG KUN DGA' DANG, DPON MO BSOD NAMS DBANG MO SOGS DAD LDAN MANG RAB KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS MTSO BDUN GYI DGON PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GSOL DPON DGE TSUL BLO BZANG STOBS LDAN NO, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MA,
